about_the_game:
Another captivating illustration from the Ukraine artist Betty Elgyn with the name of Pumpkin Champion. This puzzle box is part of our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2020 event. Once again our favorite black familiar returns for Halloween as a worthy addition to our growing collection.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Halloween Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This is a puzzle that brings a medium challenge. There are sufficiently detailed areas to pick your starting point(s) from and then fill in the gaps between them. Higher puzzle tile sets will, of course, provide a greater challenge.

Also, make sure to check the other puzzle box in this year's series: Undeadly Romance.

Another captivating illustration from the Ukraine artist Betty Elgyn with the name of Pumpkin Champion. This puzzle box is part of our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2020 event. Once again our favorite black familiar returns for Halloween as a worthy addition to our growing collection.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Halloween Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This is a puzzle that brings a medium challenge. There are sufficiently detailed areas to pick your starting point(s) from and then fill in the gaps between them. Higher puzzle tile sets will, of course, provide a greater challenge.

Also, make sure to check the other puzzle box in this year's series: Undeadly Romance.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
